dc_title_s: Map of the hill country of Ceylon showing the positions of the principal coffee estates, &c
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:190 080. scale of 3 miles to an in. Date is estimated. Front of cover carries imprint of Letts Son & Co.; label for Mason & Payne pasted inside cover. Dissected and laid on linen.|83 x 62 centimeters|Scale 1:190 080; 3 miles to an inch|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: Ceylon Observer Office; Colombo, Sri Lanka
